item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Biography I am a Senior Staff Research Scientist at Google, where I lead a team of scientists and engineers in developing and shipping production-level computer vision and machine learning models. My team’s work includes the development of Google’s Face Unlock feature, from its first launch on Pixel 4 (2019) with NIR sensors, to its evolution using commodity RGB sensors on all classes of Pixel devices: Pixel 7 (2022), Pixel Fold & 7a and Pixel 8 (2023), Pixel 8a and 9 Series (2024), Pixel 9a (2025).

item.title: Interns / Students
item.description: Interns Lan Wang (MSU/Vishnu Boddeti), 2024. Ziqian Lin (UW-Madison/Kangwook Lee), 2024, next Research Scientist at Google. Shengjie Zhu (MSU/Xiaoming Liu), 2024, next Applied Scientist at Amazon. Manli Shu (UMD/Tom Goldstein), 2023, next Researcher at Salesforce AI Research. Yiyou Sun (UW-Madison/Sharon Li), 2022, next Post-doc at UC Berkeley. Giannis Daras (UT Austin/Alexandros Dimakis), 2021, next Post-doc at MIT CSAIL. Jason Chong (UIUC/David Froysth), 2020, next Researcher at ByteDance AI Research. Shlok Mishra (UMD/David Jacobs), 2020, next Research Scientist at Meta AI.

item.title: Services
item.description: Area Chair Asian Conference on Computer Vision (ACCV), 2024 IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2023 ACM International Conference on Multimodal Interaction (ICMI), 2020 ACM International Conference on Multimodal Interaction (ICMI), 2019 IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2019 IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2018 Organizing Committee ICMI 2021 (Sponsorship Chair) Conference Review Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR), 2014–present International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV), 2015–present European Conference on Computer Vision (ECCV), 2012–present Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2015–present Asian Conference on Compute Vision (ACCV), 2012–2014 AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI), 2016–present Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS), 2019–present International Conference on Multimodal Interaction (ICMI), 2018–present Affective Computing and Intelligent Interaction (ACII), 2015 Journal Review
